classes.name: QuanticFacet
classes.description:
A facet is a list of values for a certain field occurring in the results, ordered using a configurable criteria (e.g., number of occurrences).
A QuanticFacet displays a facet of the results for the current query.

properties.name: facetId
properties.description: An unique ID used to identify the facet instance. Defaults to given facet label.

properties.name: field
properties.description: The field whose values you want to display in the facet.

properties.name: engineId
properties.description: The ID of the engine instance with which to register.

properties.name: numberOfValues
properties.description: The number of values to request for this facet. Also determines the number of additional values to request each time this facet is expanded, and the number of values to display when this facet is collapsed.

properties.name: sortCriteria
properties.description:
The sort criterion to apply to the returned facet values Possible values are:

  • score
  • numeric
  • occurences
  • automatic

properties.name: noSearch
properties.description: Whether this facet should not contain a search box.
